channel.title: Presentation on Danielle Gatland
channel.description: Recent content in Presentation on Danielle Gatland

item.title: New Zealand Planning Institute Conference 2022
item.description: At FOSS4G Oceania 2023, I presented on how to create a data collection app using QGIS and either one of the two leading data collections apps for QGIS: Mergin Maps or QField. The FOSS4G movement is about “free and open source software for geospatial” and the presentations at the FOSS4G conferences are often very transparent with people sharing their experiences, code, and projects, and collaborating to help improve the skills of everyone.

item.title: Access to Public Transport (FOSS4G Oceania 2019)
item.description: At FOSS4G Oceania 2023, I presented on how to create a data collection app using QGIS and either one of the two leading data collections apps for QGIS: Mergin Maps or QField. The FOSS4G movement is about “free and open source software for geospatial” and the presentations at the FOSS4G conferences are often very transparent with people sharing their experiences, code, and projects, and collaborating to help improve the skills of everyone.
